articles.title: George Soros hands reins of $25bn empire to son Alex - BBC
articles.description: The American financier, targeted by right-wing conspiracists, is passing control of foundations to his son.
articles.content:
US billionaire philanthropist George Soros has handed over the running of his $25bn (£19.9bn) financial and charitable empire to his son Alex.
The Hungarian-born financier said his son had "earned i… [+3159 chars]
